ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] seeds.txt does not exist error when run heritrix HEAD on windows2003
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah.  I think so (The path thats being complained about is a windows path with  separators.  CLASSPATH paths use / separators).  I added path

ansi wrote:

> This is the first time I run heritrix 1.3 on windows.
> The 1.6 vesion of JobConfigureUtils.java doesn't work,too.
> After add  Profiles/seeds.txt and Profiles/order.xml into conf
> dir.,heritrix works fine on windows.
>
> Maybe this is a bug after move heritrix's confligure file into 
> heritrix.jar.

Yeah.  I think so (The path thats being complained about is a windows 
path with '\' separators.  CLASSPATH paths use '/' separators).  I added 
path convertion utility methods.  Its untested on windows platform.  You 
want to try it?  You'll probably find other locations that need conversion.
St.Ack

>
> Ansi
>
>
> On Wed, 8 Dec 2004 09:02:11 -0000, Kristinn Sigurdsson 
> <kris@...> wrote:
> >
> > I take it this was working for you before?
> > 
> > The only relevant change I can see has been made lately is to
> > src/java/org/archive/crawler/admin/ui/JobConfigureUtils.java
> > Stack made some changes yesterday to fix a bug with reading seeds. That
> > probably broke something on Windows. Try reverting to version 1.6 of 
> that
> > file and see it that works. If so, Stack broke something, although I 
> don't
> > see anything suspicious in his commit.
> > 
> > - Kris
